page.title: 18LIFE STYLES IN BALFRON
page.content: Usually my Mum comes into my room to wake me up. I dress in my school uniform which is brown trousers and a yellow shirt with a striped tie. I go downstairs into the kitchen where I have{breakfast-}cereal with milk, and toast and peanut butter and tea. When I have combed my hair,brushed my teeth and packed my school-bag, I set off for school with my brother. We go to the lollipop lady who takes us across the road. When the bell rings at nine o'clock we go into our classes. We say The Lord's Prayer and{lessons}begin. We have{playtime}at 10.30am, when the boys play football or play Bulldog or Line Tig. After the interval we have Art till lunch-time at 12.15pm. In the afternoon we have project and poetry and after the interval we have a chapter of our serial and prepare homework. School finishes at 3.30pm.
